game.name: Good Guys vs Bad Boys
game.description:
Everywhere you find two types of guys: Good and bad. Good guys are always looking forward to seek for the positive ways to deal with the things in every situation and always get the success in impressing others with their good deeds. While, on the contrary, bad guys are those who always try to show others down with their attitude and become their boss. They want to win the world with their straightforward and aggressive behavior. Choose and decide what type of guys you want to become in Good Guys vs Bad Boys.

Join one of these two sides in this brand new adventure game for boys. Hope you have the guts to assist your team with claiming the match victory. No need to bother since you will have a plenty of maps to explore and complete your fight with the help of different types of knives and guns. Each weapon comes with different shooting patterns. The more you play this free online war game, the bigger addict you will become of it.

Good Guys vs Bad Boys is a highly challenging, bloody FPS game that allows you to learn how to stand the good guys against the bad guys in an all-out team deathmatch! Decide which team you want to go with before you come forward to destroy your opponents with the help of one of nine deadly, powerful weapons. You have a freedom to attack from below or above, up or close or from some distances in maps that is designed for fun only!
